name: aws-lambda-functions
description: A set of AWS Lambda functions that interact with AWS services
author: Radek Drweski

scripts.deploy:getGoogleMapsApiKey: powershell Compress-Archive -Path getGoogleMapsApiKey.mjs -DestinationPath getGoogleMapsApiKey.zip; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name getGoogleMapsApiKey --zip-file fileb://getGoogleMapsApiKey.zip --no-cli-pager; Remove-Item -Path ./getGoogleMapsApiKey.zip
scripts.deploy:getCompanies: powershell Compress-Archive -Path getCompanies.mjs -DestinationPath getCompanies.zip; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name getCompanies --zip-file fileb://getCompanies.zip --no-cli-pager; Remove-Item -Path ./getCompanies.zip
scripts.deploy:saveCompanyDetails: powershell Compress-Archive -Path saveCompanyDetails.mjs -DestinationPath saveCompanyDetails.zip; aws lambda update-function-code --function-name saveCompanyDetails --zip-file fileb://saveCompanyDetails.zip --no-cli-pager; Remove-Item -Path ./saveCompanyDetails.zip
